body.raw:
# Slider An input that allows the user to choose a value within a specified range. ## Installation ## Import - **SliderRoot**: All parts of the slider are included. - **SliderTrack**: The unfilled portion of the slider that displays the track. - **SliderRange**: The filled portion of the slider. - **SliderThumb**: The knob used to adjust the slider value. - **SliderThumbLabel**: The label displayed for slider values. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { Slider } from '@melio-ui/slider'; ; ``` > 'use client' must be used when rendering on the server side. ## API Reference ### SliderRoot All parts of the slider are included. TypeAttributes.Orientation

"horizontal" | "vertical" ), description: 'Direction for the placement of the Slider component.', }, { name: 'disabled', required: false, type: 'boolean', description: 'Determines whether the slider is inactive.', }, { name: 'onValueChange', required: false, type: '(value: number | number[], activeIndex: number) => void', description: 'This is an event handler that is triggered when the state of a slider changes.', }, ]} /> ### SliderTrack The unfilled portion of the slider that displays the track. ### SliderRange The filled portion of the slider. ### SliderThumb The knob used to adjust the slider value. ### SliderThumbLabel The label displayed for slider values. ## Examples ### Disabled ```jsx ``` ### Set the minimum and maximum values ```jsx ``` ### Set step size ```jsx ``` ### Display Thumb Label ```jsx ``` ### Orientation ```jsx ``` ### Range ```jsx ```
